samples.name: Header Cell
samples.description: The HeaderCell control contains 4 cells(West, North, East, South). It provides different layout if different aggregation added.

samples.name: Header Container
samples.description: The Header Container provides horizontal layout. Provides horizontal scroll on tablet and phone. On desktop provides scroll left and scroll right buttons.

samples.name: Header Container - Object Header
samples.description: The Header Container in combination with sap.m.ObjectHeader

samples.name: Header Container - No Divider
samples.description: The Header Container with no divider line

samples.name: Header Container - Vertical Mode
samples.description: The Header Container in the Vertical mode

samples.name: Process Flow
samples.description: Process Flow is a complex control that enables you to display documents or other items in their flow (fixed position).

samples.name: Scrollable Process Flow
samples.description: Process Flow is a complex control that enables you to display documents or other items in their flow (smaller place with scrolling enablement).

samples.name: Process Flow with Aggregated Nodes
samples.description: This sample shows the Process Flow control with aggregated nodes. You can use aggregated nodes to represent semantically equal nodes in the same path of your process flow (smaller place with scrolling enablement).

samples.name: Multiple Root Nodes
samples.description: This sample for Process Flow shows the case where multiple root nodes are used. The sample is built with sap.m.Page control.

samples.name: Process Flow Merged Lanes
samples.description: This sample shows the Process Flow control with merged lanes and update of nodes.

samples.name: Process Flow Update Lanes
samples.description: This sample shows the Process Flow control with an update of lanes.

samples.name: Process Flow with Connection Labels
samples.description: This sample shows the Process Flow control with connection labels.

samples.name: Timeline
samples.description: Sample Timeline with embedded controls and event handling .

samples.name: Timeline Binding
samples.description: Sample Timeline with oData binding and growing property.

samples.name: ChartContainer - Simple Toolbar
samples.description: Shows a chart with a toolbar including a zoom and a pushbutton for showing or hiding the legend.

samples.name: ChartContainer - Simple Toolbar with FixFlex Layout
samples.description: In addition to the basic features as zoom and legend, this sample shows a chart with responsive height (instead of fixed height) in ChartContainer. For this sample, the FixFlex layout is used.

samples.name: ChartContainer – Toolbar with Dimension Switch and Different Types of Charts
samples.description: In addition to the basic features as zoom and legend, this sample shows a selection of different types of charts. For each chart, different dimensions can be chosen.

samples.name: ChartContainer – Toolbar with Dimension Switch and Customizable Icons
samples.description: In addition to the basic features as zoom and legend, this sample shows one type of a chart with various dimensions. The toolbar can be enhanced with icons by the user to switch to related content.
